item.description:
As convenient as online dating is, it still takes work. What annoys most people is sending out email after email and not getting any response back and dealing with five stage Faders. Let's work together to hone your skills and help you spot the bad daters more quickly or work through common online dating frustration. You can sign up for any one of our sessions to get quick, insightful advice and tips to help you optimize your online dating experience.You'll learn how to get your profile noticed and viewed, how to move offline quicker and how to identify who is for real and who isn't.

No more bad dates. No more time wasters. No more flakes.

 

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

INSTRUCTIONS - PLEASE READ CAREFULLY

These are one on one sessions. You call in from your home.

Upon registration, you'll receive an email within a few hours to confirm/schedule the time of your session

YOU CHOOSE YOUR SESSION TIME!
Sessions are held weekdays between 10am and 6pm or Saturday afternoons between 1pm and 6pm.

30-40 Minutes long

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~


One on One Profile Analysis

The trick to online dating success is knowing your audience. You and I will sit together (via teleconference) and go over your profile. What we’ll be doing is looking for any possible negative buzz words or red flags in your profile. I’ll give you an gentle but honest assessment of your ad and tell you why you might be getting the responses you receive. We’ll look at everything from your main profile text to your headline to photo selection to profile question responses. I’ll give you a profile of the types of people you will attract. $35 w/promo code ATWYS

Book Session Here http://atwysoneonone.eventbrite.com/


The Basics

Whether you'e brand new to online dating or a pro, there are basics about online dating that you should implement to avoid getting burnt out. We'll discuss the common online dating experience, which steps are crucial and which should be avoided all together. We'll also review your personal online dating experience, quickly look over your profile and see if maybe there are changes that need to be made to improve your experience.$35 w/promo code ATWYS
Book Session Here http://atwysoneonone.eventbrite.com/

 

 

The Background Check

Don't let the title fool you. We won't be cyber-researching your dates. Instead, we'll focus on analyzing the profiles of the people that interest you. We'll look for redflags or inconsistencies in their profiles, look over photos and review email exchanges. This package is vital if you wish to learn how to spot and avoid the shadier types and the time wasters.$35 w/promo code ATWYS

Book Session Here http://atwysoneonone.eventbrite.com/


The Trouble Shooter

This type of session is discuss specific situations that you've had with your dates. Are they a fader? What are their real intentions? Why haven't they responded? Should I make the next move? This package is for people who have a specific scenario they wish to deconstruct and understand.$25 w/promo code ATWYS

Book Session Here http://atwysoneonone.eventbrite.com/




READ TESTIMONIALS FROM PAST SEMINAR ATTENDEES:

http://andthatswhyyouresingle.com/testimonials/

READ MY BIO:

http://andthatswhyyouresingle.com/guest-speakerwriting-opportunities/

 

FEATURED IN:


 

 

Your Tango

 

"Not sure you get to read these. Well, if you do, Thanks for giving me the confidence to get back out there. After being married for many years, it was strange to get out and attempt to meet someone. I attended your dating group Q&A about reading signs etc and right after the meeting had dinner with someone from the group. After that I had the confidence to follow through with some other women. It has resulted in being with my girlfriend for over 3 years now. We have a great relationship. Thanks for helping me bring out the best in me. - C from NY"

item.name: Get More/Better Dates with Your Dating Profile - Weed Out The Time Wasters
